assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The institutional ethics committees of the institutes of the authors (PS, SBS, DB, JS and GS) approved the protocol. Each of the five committees approved the study for the corresponding district. All the study participants were informed about the study’s purpose, and their consent was obtained before conducting interviews.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no conflict of interest/competing interests with their work.
